Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Vertigo 50% Sudden cardiac death 7.5% Autosomal dominant inheritance - Seizures - Sudden death - Syncope - Ventricular tachycardia - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
